description:
Freddie`s horse Kokuryu goes on a rampage, which prompts the Cromartie boys to think about pets. After, they lose interest and make Maeda do all the work.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Hole in Lotta Love / "Magic Bath Mat" / STRAY CAT
